page.title: 09VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: Most of the people living in this area are of the{upper class}and have retired to the area.They enjoy the peaceful surroundings and the quiet life.It is a{close-knit community}that enjoy a happy atmosphere. Due to the lack of shops the local residents have to travel at least 5 miles to the nearest shopping centre but,most families in this area can afford to travel this distance at least twice a week either by public or private transport.The local residence buy their bread from the{local baker who gets up every morning to bake fresh bread.Most of the villagers attend the community gatherings that are held at the village hall,and they all help the{up keep of the village.
